message:
. from: Ahsanul Azim, UAE, Dubai.
Ajke Basher kellar Post and picture gulor Maddhome Towhidi jonotar je dhol dekhtesi Eman Rokkhar Andolone, dekhe Chokher pani Dhore Rakhte partesina. khub Kosto lagtese Aj amra Jibikar tagite Dubaite asi kintu Ay Bishal Long march a Onshogrohon korte partesina......... Doa kori Allah jeno LongMarch a Asha sokol Towhidi Jonotake Kobul korene....... Ameen.
